input: Values define self. Morals guide actions. Ethics lead decisions.
validityText:
The given input is a paragraph of text. It contains three separate sentences, which are: "Values define self.", "Morals guide actions.", and "Ethics lead decisions.". The input includes letters and punctuation. Furthermore, it is not composed solely of whitespace characters, as it contains meaningful content with sentences. Each of the sentences is properly punctuated. 

Therefore, the input complies with the requirements of the input specification.

OK
coverageText:
```html

Values define self and help to form our identity and character.

Morals guide our actions and determine what we consider to be right or wrong.

Ethics lead our decisions and shape how we interact and engage with the world.

```

The second paragraph has one tag around "guide" and multiple tags surrounding "actions," "right," and "wrong." 3. The third paragraph has one tag around "lead" and multiple tags for "decisions," "interact," and "engage." Thus, the output complies with the description as each requirement is met, including the condition of having at least three

tags. There are no violations observed based on the given description. OK
